verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after נִבְנְתָה֙ <S%H1129><s%> was built הַחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> Now it came to pass when the wall וָאַעֲמִ֖יד <S%H5975><s%> and I had set up הַדְּלָת֑וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors וַיִּפָּ֥קְד֛וּ <S%H6485><s%> were appointed הַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֥ים <S%H7778><s%> and the porters וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <S%H7891><s%> and the singers וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites

וָאֲצַוֶּ֞ה <S%H6680><s%> charge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנָ֣נִי <S%H2607><s%> Hanani אָחִ֗י <S%H251><s%> That I gave my brother וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנַנְיָ֛ה <S%H2608><s%> and Hananiah שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> the ruler הַבִּירָ֖ה <S%H1002><s%> of the palace עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> over Jerusalem כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> for he [was] a faithful וְיָרֵ֥א <S%H3372><s%> and feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God מֵרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> above many

[וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> answer ק) לָהֶ֗ם לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִפָּֽתְח֞וּ <S%H6605><s%> be opened שַׁעֲרֵ֤י <S%H8179><s%> unto them Let not the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until חֹ֣ם <S%H2527><s%> be hot הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> until the sun וְעַ֨ד <S%H5704><s%> and while הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they עֹמְדִ֛ים <S%H5975><s%> and while they stand by יָגִ֥יפוּ <S%H1479><s%> let them shut הַדְּלָת֖וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors וֶאֱחֹ֑זוּ <S%H270><s%> and bar וְהַעֲמֵ֗יד <S%H5975><s%> [them] and appoint מִשְׁמְרוֹת֙ <S%H4931><s%> watches יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּמִשְׁמָר֔וֹ <S%H4929><s%> in his watch וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> front בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> [to be] over against his house

וְהָעִ֞יר <S%H5892><s%> Now the city רַחֲבַ֤ת <S%H7342><s%> broad יָדַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3027><s%> able וּגְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> and great וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> but the people מְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> [were] few בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ <S%H8432><s%> therein וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else בָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> and the houses בְּנוּיִֽם׃ <S%H1129><s%> [were] not builded

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> put אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> And my God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into לִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> into mine heart וָאֶקְבְּצָ֞ה <S%H6908><s%> to gather together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹרִ֧ים <S%H2715><s%> the nobles וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסְּגָנִ֛ים <S%H5461><s%> and the rulers וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people לְהִתְיַחֵ֑שׂ <S%H3187><s%> that they might be reckoned by genealogy וָֽאֶמְצָ֗א <S%H4672><s%> And I found סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> a register הַיַּ֙חַשׂ֙ <S%H3188><s%> of the genealogy הָעוֹלִ֣ים <S%H5927><s%> of them which came up בָּרִאשׁוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> at the first וָאֶמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> and found כָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> written בּֽוֹ׃ פ

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <S%H4082><s%> of the province הָעֹלִים֙ <S%H5927><s%> that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> of those that had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <S%H1540><s%> had carried away נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> whom Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וַיָּשׁ֧וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and came again לִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וְלִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and to Judah אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H5892><s%> unto his city

הַבָּאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> Who came עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <S%H2216><s%> with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Jeshua נְחֶמְיָ֡ה <S%H5166><s%> Nehemiah עֲ֠זַרְיָה <S%H5838><s%> Azariah רַֽעַמְיָ֨ה <S%H7485><s%> Raamiah נַחֲמָ֜נִי <S%H5167><s%> Nahamani מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <S%H1114><s%> Bilshan מִסְפֶּ֥רֶת <S%H4559><s%> Mispereth בִּגְוַ֖י <S%H902><s%> Bigvai נְח֣וּם <S%H5149><s%> Nehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <S%H1196><s%> Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <S%H4557><s%> The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> of men עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <S%H6551><s%> of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> thousand מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> two ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <S%H8203><s%> of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children אָרַ֔ח <S%H733><s%> of Arah שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two ס

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> The children פַחַ֥ת מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H6355><s%> of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> of Jeshua וְיוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> and Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שְׁמֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> teen ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children זַתּ֔וּא <S%H2240><s%> of Zattu שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> and five ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children זַכָּ֔י <S%H2140><s%> of Zaccai שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְשִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H8346><s%> and threescore ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children בִנּ֔וּי <S%H1131><s%> of Binnui שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children בֵבָ֔י <S%H893><s%> of Bebai שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children עַזְגָּ֔ד <S%H5803><s%> of Azgad אַלְפַּ֕יִם <S%H505><s%> thousand שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> two ס

בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> The children אֲדֹ֣נִיקָ֔ם <S%H140><s%> of Adonikam שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> threescore וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> and seven ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children בִגְוָ֔י <S%H902><s%> of Bigvai אַלְפַּ֖יִם <S%H505><s%> two thousand שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> threescore וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> and seven ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children עָדִ֔ין <S%H5720><s%> of Adin שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> and five ס
בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> The children אָטֵ֥ר <S%H333><s%> of Ater לְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2396><s%> of Hezekiah תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <S%H8673><s%> ninety וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children חָשֻׁ֔ם <S%H2828><s%> of Hashum שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children בֵצָ֔י <S%H1209><s%> of Bezai שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children חָרִ֔יף <S%H2756><s%> of Hariph מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten ס
בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The children גִבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <S%H8673><s%> ninety וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> and five ס

אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> The men בֵֽית־ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem וּנְטֹפָ֔ה <S%H5199><s%> and Netophah מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> fourscore וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight ס
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> of עֲנָת֔וֹת <S%H6068><s%> of Anathoth מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight ס
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> he בֵית־ עַזְמָ֖וֶת <S%H1041><s%> of Bethazmaveth אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two ס

אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> he קִרְיַ֤ת יְעָרִים֙ <S%H7157><s%> of Kirjathjearim כְּפִירָ֣ה <S%H3716><s%> Chephirah וּבְאֵר֔וֹת <S%H881><s%> and Beeroth שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> and three ס

אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> of הָֽרָמָה֙ <S%H7414><s%> of Ramah וָגָ֔בַע <S%H1387><s%> and Geba שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> and one ס
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> of מִכְמָ֔ס <S%H4363><s%> of Michmas מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two ס
אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> he בֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel וְהָעָ֔י <S%H5857><s%> and Ai מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> and three ס
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> he נְב֛וֹ <S%H5015><s%> Nebo אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> of the other חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two ס

בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> The children עֵילָ֣ם <S%H5867><s%> Elam אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> of the other אֶ֕לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> and four ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children חָרִ֔ם <S%H2766><s%> of Harim שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty ס
בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The children יְרֵח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> and five ס
